sentences.sContent: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.sCn: 任何一个蜂房中最重要的成员都是蜂王。

sentences.sContent: What people must remember is that one hive quickly become two, two become four and four become eight.
sentences.sContent_eng: What people must remember is that one hive quickly become two, two become four and four become eight.
sentences.sCn: 人们一定要记住的是，一个蜂巢很快会变成两个，两个变成四个，四个变成八个。

synos.tran: 蜂房，蜂巢；热闹的场所；熙攘喧闹的人群

remMethod.val: 蜜蜂们生活(live)忙， 建蜂房(hive)

trans.tranOther: a small box where  bees  are kept, or the bees that live in this box
